hadith.chapter: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah - كتاب الطهارة وسننها
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا محمد بن يحيى، حدثنا عبد الرزاق، أنبأنا معمر، عن أيوب، عن ابن سيرين، عن أم عطية، قالت لم نكن نرى الصفرة والكدرة شيئا ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: It was narrated that Umm 'Atiyyah said: "We did not think anything of the yellowish or brownish discharge." (Sahih)(Another chain) It was narrated that umm 'Atiyyah said: "We did not think that the yellowish or brownish discharge counted for anything."Muhammed bin Yahya said: "Wuhaib (who narrated the second version) is the better of them with this according to us."
